fme.vm.Subject: Your FME Training Virtual Machine connection files
fme.vm.template.email.subject: Your FME Training Virtual Machine connection files
fme.vm.template.email: The attached RDP files can be used to connect to your FME Virtual Machine. The virtual machine will shut down automatically at 4:30pm Pacific Time.
Please wait 10 minutes after receiving this email before trying to connect the the virtual machine; they take approximately 10 minutes to boot.
Double-click on _PublicIpAddress_.rdp to open it in Microsoft Remote Desktop.
Some organizations block the port used by RDP; port 3389.
If _PublicIpAddress_.rdp does not work, please try the other two RDP files; _PublicIpAddress_Port8080.rdp and _PublicIpAddress_Port443.rdp.
These RDP files use different ports that might not be blocked.

If none of the RDP files will connect, then your Security Administrator is likely using a Web Security Gateway. This cannot be bypassed without contacting your IT Department. Please contact your IT Department, and tell them you need to use Remote Desktop to connect to _PublicIpAddress_
As a last-resort, you can try to use an HTML5 Remote Desktop Client.
